infobox_data.Effect: Call in 2 Wastelots for a kamikaze attack at the target location
Notes: A red flare will be displayed at designated zone right after support power deployment
Wastelot stats:Hit points: 180Armor: Light AircraftSpeed: 34 (Jet)Turn rate: 10Crashes upon reaching the target, dealing250-125damage over a radius of 5 and leaves behind a medium radiation field
